article.headline: Charlotte 87, Davidson 68
article.story: DAVIDSON, N.C. (AP) -- Brendan Plavich hit seven 3-pointers and scored 23 points -- all in the final 11 minutes -- to help Charlotte rally to an 87-68 win over Davidson on Wednesday. Plavich, the 49ers' leading scorer at 15.4 points per game coming in, was held scoreless until he hit a turnaround jumper with 10:32 left. After teammate Martin Iti's bucket, Plavich nailed three consecutive 3s, one from 25 feet, another from 27 feet and the third an off-balance heave from the left corner to put Charlotte ahead 60-46 with 8:08 to go. Plavich hit four more long 3-pointers as the 49ers (4-2) closed the game on a 42-14 run to hold onto the Hornets Nest Trophy, given annually to the winner of the in-county rivalry. Plavich has made at least three 3s in every game and is 31-of-58 from behind the arc this season. Curtis Withers added 15 points and 10 rebounds and E.J. Drayton scored 15 as Charlotte rallied from an 11-point first-half deficit and shook off the hangover of a triple-overtime loss to Alabama on Saturday. Brendan Winters had 19 points and Ian Johnson added 14 for Davidson (3-4), which was outrebounded 39-27 as it lost to Charlotte for the eighth time in nine tries. Davidson erased an early 8-2 deficit by hitting five of its first six 3-point attempts. Logan Kosmalski's layup with 3:51 left gave the Wildcats their largest lead, 37-26. But Davidson would go nearly eight minutes without scoring and miss 15 of 16 3-pointers during a 24-minute stretch.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
